scripts.setup: npm run ex:setup && npm run elm:setup
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run tailwind:dev" "npm run ts:dev" "npm run elm:dev" "npm run ex:dev"
scripts.server: concurrently "npm run tailwind:dev" "npm run ts:dev" "npm run elm:server" "npm run ex:dev"
scripts.test: npm run ts:test && npm run elm:test && npm run ex:test
scripts.build: npm run tailwind:build && npm run ts:build && npm run elm:build && npm run ex:build
scripts.ex:install: cd backend && mix local.hex --force && mix deps.get
scripts.ex:setup: cd backend && mix deps.get && mix ecto.setup
scripts.clever: npm run elm:setup && cd backend && mix deps.get && mix phx.digest && mix phx.server
